Let the [[agent]] attack in the direction specified.

== Syntax ==
: <code>attack <direction: string></code>

== Arguments ==
<code>direction: string</code>
: Specifies the direction of Agent to attack.
: Must be one of:
:* <code>forward</code> to attack forward.
:* <code>back</code> to attack backward.
:* <code>left</code> to attack leftward.
:* <code>right</code> to attack rightward.
:* <code>up</code> to attack upward.
:* <code>down</code> to attack downward.

== Result ==
Always success, Agent attacks in the specified direction by {{hp|8}} attack damage.
